::Cleder/Rixer/Forrior/Blyer/Firearm/Hot Rod::

Firearm ducks the punch, trying to sweep McGowan's legs out.
While Firearm goes for the legs, Cleder, Rixer, Forrior, and Blyer
shoots two shots each at his head.(Combined, this should put him off
balance, and take him down.)

Hot Rod is kneed in the gut, but he also manages to keep his grip. He 
sets his leg behind Depp's, and pushes, in a attempt to take Depp off
his feet.
"Your good, but you will lose this fight," says Hot Rod.
